text:
A few grammar/spelling mistakes:

recieving = receiving

Comet support allows a servlet to process IO aynchronously, <here>recieving</here> events

implments = implements

The following pseudo code servlet <here>implments</here> asynchronous

simple = simply

To set a timeout, <here>simple</here> set a request attribute
creator: futung.cheng@yahoo.com

text: Thanks for the report. This has been fixed in trunk and 6.0.x and will be in 6.0.19 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
